contraindications.disease: The possibility of obtundation seizures or dystonic reaction of the head and neck following overdose may create a risk of aspiration with induced emesis
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Paliperidone is an atypical antipsychotic developed by Janssen Pharmaceutica Chemically paliperidone is primary active metabolite of the older antipsychotic risperidone paliperidone is 9 hydroxyrisperidone The mechanism of action is unknown but it is likely to act via a similar pathway to risperidone
